lyrics.text: Lesson 78. The last one. First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 第78课。最后一课。首先听，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: For how long did the writer give up smoking?
After reading an article entitled, Cigarette Smoking and Your Health, I used a cigarette to calm my nerves.
lyrics.translation: 读了一篇题为《吸烟与健康》的文章后，我用一支香烟来使自己镇定下来。

lyrics.text: I smoked with concentration and pleasure, as I was sure that this would be my last cigarette.
lyrics.translation: 我专注而愉快地吸着烟，因为我确信这将是我最后一支烟。

lyrics.text: For a whole week, I did not smoke at all, and during this time, my wife suffered terribly.
lyrics.translation: 整整一周，我一点烟都没抽，这段时间里，我妻子痛苦极了。

lyrics.text: I had all the usual symptoms of someone giving up smoking, a bad temper, and an enormous appetite.
lyrics.translation: 我有了所有戒烟者通常有的症状，脾气暴躁，胃口大增。

lyrics.text: My friends kept on offering me cigarettes and cigars.
lyrics.translation: 我的朋友们不断地向我提供香烟和雪茄。

lyrics.text: They made no effort to hide their amusement whenever I produced a packet of sweets from my pocket.
lyrics.translation: 每当我从口袋里掏出一包糖果时，他们都不掩饰他们的娱乐。

lyrics.text: After seven days of this, I went to a party.
lyrics.translation: 经过七天的这个之后，我去参加了一个派对。

lyrics.text: Everybody around me was smoking, and I felt extremely uncomfortable.
lyrics.translation: 我周围的人都在抽烟，我感到非常不舒服。

lyrics.text: When my old friend Brian urged me to accept a cigarette, it was more than I could bear.
lyrics.translation: 当我的老朋友布莱恩极力劝我接受一支香烟时，我实在无法忍受。

lyrics.text: I took one guiltily, lit it, and smoked with satisfaction.
lyrics.translation: 我内疚地拿了一支，点燃它，然后心满意足地抽了起来。

lyrics.text: My wife was delighted that things had returned to normal once more.
lyrics.translation: 我的妻子很高兴事情又恢复了正常。

lyrics.text: Anyway, as Brian pointed out, it is the easiest thing in the world to give up smoking.
lyrics.translation: 无论如何，正如布莱恩所指出的，戒烟是世界上最容易的事情。

lyrics.text: He himself has done it lots of times.
lyrics.translation: 他自己已经做过很多次了。
